text: Aspergillus heyangensis is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Aenei section. The species was first described in 1994.Sun & Qi 1994, Acta Mycol. Sinica 13(2): 81 It has been reported to produce a decaturin. ==Growth and morphology== A. heyangensis has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_heyangensis_cya.png|Aspergillus heyangensis growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_heyangensis_meaox.png|Aspergillus heyangensis growing on MEAOX plate == References == heyangensis Category:Fungi described in 1994
title: Aspergillus heyangensis
